programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Fantôme / Tous en Scène!) S2 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Le Fantôme / Tous en Scène!»When a mysterious ghost is causing havoc around the Lookout,The pups discover it's not a ghost at all - it's Marshall... sleepwalking!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué) S2 (n°204)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué»Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Diamond Geezer) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Diamond Geezer»To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge) S1 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and a Runaway Gerbils / Paddington Wins Ranger Badge»Paddington accidentally releases the school pet Gerbil that Judy is looking after. Paddington and Judy search for it in the house and in Mr. Curry's garden. // Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le timbre) S1 (16/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le timbre»Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La grande course des oiseaux !) S6 (n°619)
programme.desc: «La grande course des oiseaux !»In the Fastest Feather in the Race, it's Team Flightless versus cocky Amelia the Peregrine Falcon. Though Penguin Nonny, Ostrich Oona, and Kiwi Goby can't fly, these birds of a feather flock together! Will teamwork be enough to win the trophy?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (À la plage avec Blue) S2 (n°19)
programme.desc: «À la plage avec Blue»We've set up a tubular pretend beach in the backyard and play a game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to see there. We'll learn what items sink and float, and swim underwater to learn about camouflage with the help of our ocean friends.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Caracol Cove) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Caracol Cove»Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Riquiqui le Tardigrade) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Riquiqui le Tardigrade»Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et le mystère des tartes disparues) S2 (19/21)
programme.desc: «Blue et le mystère des tartes disparues»Mr. Salt's pies keep disappearing.Where did the pies go?! In this very mysterious episode, we're detectives and play Blue's Clues to find the missing pies.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La bestiole baveuse) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La bestiole baveuse»A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Tina à la rescousse) S1 (9/21)
programme.desc: «Tina à la rescousse»After Enrique steals the heart of El Bravo, there's only one person who can help Santi and crew save the day: Tomás's younger sister, Prima Tina!

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'Mores) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «S'Mores»Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un Atterrissage Forcé / Le Mariage) S2 (9/26)
programme.desc: «Un Atterrissage Forcé / Le Mariage»Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi are getting married! Famer's Yumi's barn is being decorated for the big day and all the pups are helping. A big storm blows through and takes down a wall of the barn! It's up to Ryder and the PAW Patrol to save the barn and the day - the wedding day! // Skye's favorite stunt pilot, Ace Soarenson, is heading to Adventure Bay to put on a fantastic air show. Just before arrival she runs into engine trouble! It's up to Skye and the PAW Patrol to save Ace and her plane so the show can go on!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le porte-bonheur) S2 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le porte-bonheur»Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les étoiles) S2 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Les étoiles»George loves space and when he needs to sleep, he turns on his space mobile. Peppa doesn't understand that until Daddy Pig tells her about the stars. And when she gets to look through the telescope at Grandpa Pig, Peppa is over ... the space is super!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Collection) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «The Collection»Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête costumée de Blue) S1 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La fête costumée de Blue»Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Marcus, Seul Dans la Tour de Contrôle / La Pat'patrouille Sauve les Cerfs) S2 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Marcus, Seul Dans la Tour de Contrôle / La Pat'patrouille Sauve les Cerfs»The puppies go skydiving but Marshall doesn't dare to participate. He may stay at home to watch the Lookout. The bay is frozen, and a few deer cross the bay to find food.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch) S9 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch»When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant) S2 (n°215)
programme.desc: «Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !»When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Meteor Shower / Paddington and the Talent Show) S1 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Meteor Shower / Paddington and the Talent Show»Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon»Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade, but instead of cutting lemons, they cut corners and learn if something's worth doing, it's worth doing right.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Pancakes: Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Busy Baby) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Busy Baby»Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's Robot) S1 (n°32)
programme.desc: «Bubu's Robot»Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubble Trouble) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Bubble Trouble»Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Nap»Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toux de Pedro) S3 (3/52)
programme.desc: «La toux de Pedro»Mamie et Papy Cochon viennent pour un dîner avec maman et papa Cochon, mais Peppa et George sont trop fatigués pour aller au lit, jusqu'à ce qu'on leur racontent une histoire...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bibliothèque) S3 (4/52)
programme.desc: «La bibliothèque»Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le château aux 4 vents) S1 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Le château aux 4 vents»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma cousine Chloé) S1 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Ma cousine Chloé»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Héros de Jeu Vidéo) S5 (16/20)
programme.desc: «Héros de Jeu Vidéo»Blaze and AJ are super excited to play their new video game. But when a video game wizard makes the game come alive, Blaze and AJ must level up and save Axle City from pixel pandemonium.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Pneus fabuleux) S4 (10/20)
programme.desc: «Pneus fabuleux»When his tires get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race for good. Luckily, Gabby is there with a new set of Power Tires - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs to keep rolling.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les aventures des chiots qui font du baby baby-sitting / Les chiots sauvent le feu d'artifice.) S2 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Les aventures des chiots qui font du baby baby-sitting / Les chiots sauvent le feu d'artifice.»Adventure Bay Parade Day goes awry when Alex puts too many balloons on Katie's bathtub float. It literally "floats" away!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Fantôme / Tous en Scène!) S2 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Le Fantôme / Tous en Scène!»When a mysterious ghost is causing havoc around the Lookout,The pups discover it's not a ghost at all - it's Marshall... sleepwalking!

programme.desc: «Paddington Flies a Kite / Paddington the Detective»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 (n°11)
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket - and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.desc: «S'mores»Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

Just before arrival she runs into engine trouble! It's up to Skye and the PAW Patrol to save Ace and her plane so the show can go on!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le porte-bonheur) S2 (11/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le porte-bonheur»Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en bateau de Polly) S3 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en bateau de Polly»Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Delphine l'âne) S3 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Delphine l'âne»Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de pompier) S3 (13/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de pompier»When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Prank Day) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Prank Day»Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Present for Ron) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Present for Ron»Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Surprise Box) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Blue's Surprise Box»It's LOVE DAY! Josh and Blue LOVE Love Day, and Blue is making YOU something very special. While we play Blue's Clues to figure out what she's making, we help Slippery finish his Love Day Cards and help cheer up our sad Heart Friends.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le gentil dragon / Les trois petits cochons) S3 (9/26)
programme.desc: «Le gentil dragon / Les trois petits cochons»The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc) S2 (n°208)
programme.desc: «La puissance du cristal / Un Métal en toc»Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. // What's worse than Sir Steel? Two Sir Steels! Can the Deer Squad spot the real one with Muffin's help?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup»Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer) S1 (14/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fingertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooteer»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse»When an out-of-this-world visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark and his friends must put their stellar communication skills to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coach Grandma) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Coach Grandma»Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Remember-ator) S1 (n°35)
programme.desc: «The Remember-ator»Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Dada-Cabriole) S4 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Dada-Cabriole»Peppa and George get a special package from their Aunt Dottie who lives far away, in another country. When Mr Zebra delivers it, Peppa and George will have to share the present and play with it together.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Voyage en train) S3 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Le Voyage en train»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les crêpes) S1 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La garderie à domicile) S1 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La garderie à domicile»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La voleuse de bonbons) S5 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La voleuse de bonbons»Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La poursuite de minuit) S4 (20/20)
programme.desc: «La poursuite de minuit»It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up super late for the ultimate all-night race: the Midnight Mile! And the first truck to cross the finish line will win the Glow-in-the-Dark trophy!
